Key Match Events: Shaheen Shah Afridi took 3 wickets for 22 runs
Barry McCarthy took 3 wickets for 15 runs
Josh Little scored 22 runs off 18 balls
Gareth Delany scored 31 runs off 19 balls
Shaheen Shah Afridi scored 13 runs off 5 balls
Post-Match Reflections: Shaheen Shah Afridi was awarded the Player of the Match

Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan won the match by 3 wickets with 7 balls remaining
Others: The match was played at Central Broward Regional Park Stadium Turf Ground, Lauderhill
The match was a part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024
Pakistan elected to field first and won the toss
